author: JAZZ
text:
🫠 🫠 🫠 🫠 🫠 🫠 🫠
Just found this emoji in a tweet and don't know where it comes from but I need this on my feed.

author: JAZZ
text:
✨

What's the point of living
If you can't let the feeling of love out
That gives the life a worthwhile meaning
Since your first hearts pound.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
✨

There was this genuine love
Only breathing to be lived
But the fear was above
Suffocating it only to be missed.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
✨

But their parents were strict
Denied them the joyful contact
Because their egos were in a raging conflict
Since they agreed to a never-get-hurt pact.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
✨

There were two children
At the core of these grown bodies
Who loved each others companion
Only wanted to live far away from lies.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
✨

There was a blossom
A spark between two soul
Birthed in the hearts bottom
Connected them to a whole.

Or maybe they were already connected
But living in that illusion
Cause witnessing a miracle this blessed
Would leave them in divine confusion.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
Well my friend
You might be god sent
But I ain't no fool
For letting a crime this cruel
Live rent free in my heart
Tearing me from inside apart.

So hello stranger on a business card.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
For so long you confused it with family
In fact it's your vicious enemy.
Where you are most afraid
Shows you how to get the emotional debt paid.
The one you created by befriending your pal
Instead of your good hearted gal.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
The only way back to my shore
Is the death of your poor ego.
For that is only one thing in need
A sacrifice of some religious kind indeed.
Not the one of an animal
But the one you carry inside of you as a pal.

#emotions #poetry #bars #drake #spirituality

author: JAZZ
text:
🔷🔹🔹🔹🔷🔹🔹🔹🔶🔹🔹🔹🔷

Listen, 
I even elevated it
By having a jumbo tissue box
hidden in the cabinet.
Ten years from now
I would have laughed at myself
for even putting that
in my shelve.

#poetry #bars #emotions #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🔷🔹🔹🔹🔶🔹🔹🔹🔷🔹🔹🔹🔷

I started putting tissue boxes
in my room. 
Now I have three of them
in a full bloom. 
At different spots
forming the holy trinity
in case of an
emotional emergency.

#poetry #bars #emotions #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🔶🔹🔹🔹🔷🔹🔹🔹🔷🔹🔹🔹🔷

Ten years from now
I was at a resting heart rate
While watching horror movies
like it was my fate.
Now I feel like getting a
heart attack
When I attempt to rewatch them
back to back.

#poetry #bars #emotions #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
I told her to change her perspective
'cause she was looking at the wrong lake. 
While the scorpio was selective
Only to be found in the art of Picasso and words of Drake.

#poetry #picasso #scorpio #passion #emotionless #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
I once had a talk with a friend of an age
a girl with a soul of a scorpio
asking why there isn't a meme page about them like the aquarius show.

#poetry #emotionless #scorpio #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🖤

If you don't feel an ounce of emotion
while listening to Emotionless by Drake
then I doubt you have a soul foundation
'cause your life must be a fake.

#poetry #emotionless #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🫐

I ain't no Airbnb mansion
you just book
whenever you need a vacation
from a real life situation.

#retrogade #poetry #spirituality #vibration #toxiclove #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🍑

I ain't no 24/7 access w/o limitation
where you pay me off
to buy my unique passion
for the sake of your own satisfaction. 

#retrogade #poetry #spirituality #vibration #toxiclove #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🍇

I ain't no gas station
you just visit 
whenever you hit desperation 
to get your daily ration.

#retrogade #poetry #spirituality #vibration #toxiclove #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🍒

I ain't no high level of vibration
you only try to hit
when you are in stagnation
with your own path of elevation.

#retrogade #poetry #spirituality #vibration #toxiclove #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🍋

I ain't no drug addiction
you need to inject
when you're looking for a culmination
to feel any kind of stimulation.

#retrogade #lyrics #poetry #stimulation #toxiclove #drake

author: JAZZ
text:
🍓

I ain't no tourist destination
where you go to Nepal
to seek some salvation
for your soul of damnation.

#retrogade #lyrics #poetry #spirituality #toxiclove #drake
